hero_lead:
With proven technology and global partnerships,
we lead brands for children and families.
ryan_tagline:
No.1 Stroller brand in korea
Create Future for Mom & Baby
ryan_body_1: RYAN was launched to create baby care products that share everyday moments filled with children's happy smiles. The brand was named after the founder.
ryan_body_2: Founded in 1988 with a father's love for his son, the brand has evolved over time with a grandfather's love for his grandchildren, creating safe and comfortable products for children.
ryan_body_3: RYAN puts authenticity at the heart of every product, and has been consistently loved by consumers, winning Forbes Best Brand Award and First Brand Award.
joie_tagline:
We build them
SAFER, BETTER, STRONGER
joie_body_1: JOIE is a premium British baby care brand with presence in over 105 countries across Europe, Asia and beyond.
joie_body_2: Recognized in global markets with over 174 product awards including design awards and safety certifications.
joie_body_3: Through a diverse lineup of car seats, strollers, high chairs and more, JOIE is loved as a total premium baby care specialist brand.
tavo_tagline:
Pet Protection Reimagined
Pet protection like never before
tavo_body_1: Tavo believes that life is better when pets and people share it together. We combine timeless style, purpose-driven innovation and decades of safety expertise to create products that comfort pets, protect them from the unexpected, and fit beautifully into your life.
tavo_body_2: A more special everyday, richer adventures, peace of mind: that is the Tavo way.
